attributes.action: MP's should not take a 32% pay rise. If they do we are not all in this together.
attributes.additional_details: The government must announce that MP's will not take a pay during this governments tenure. We are not all in this together if you take a 32% rise. They should think hard about the message send to the country. They are asking everyone else to take the strain. This shows how immoral they are and do not care how much everyone else is struggling. Were all in this together ? Do not insult our intelligence. WE ARE NOT !!!!
